#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int isPal( int n ) {
	
	string s = "";
	int ct, i;

	while( n > 0 ) {

		s = s + (char)( ( n % 10 ) + '0');
		n /= 10;
	}

	ct = s.length();

	for( i = 0;i < ct/2;i++ )
		if( s[ i ] != s[ ct - i - 1 ] )
			return 0;

	return 1;
}

int main() {
	
	vector<int> A;
	int i, n, t, k;

	for( i = 1;i < 100000;i++ ) {

		if( isPal( i ) )
			A.push_back( i );
	}

	n = A.size();

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d", &k );

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
			if( A[ i ] > k ) {
				printf("%d\n", A[ i ] );
				break;
			}

	}
/*	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		cout << A[ i ] << endl;
*/
	return 0;
}
